name: CTF Lab
description: Time to put your Linux skills to the test! Complete these Capture The Flag challenges to prove you've mastered the basics.
short_description: Complete 7 hands-on Linux challenges in a real cloud environment to prove your command line skills.

learning_steps.text: Make sure the lab repo is cloned
learning_steps.action: Make sure the lab repo is cloned
learning_steps.description: If you haven't already, clone the Linux CTF repository:
The lab uses Terraform to provision the CTF environment. Make sure you understand terraform init and terraform apply from the IaC topic.

learning_steps.title: Linux CTFs Repository
learning_steps.description: The repository README contains all instructions for setting up and completing the CTF challenges.
Navigate to your cloud provider's folder and deploy the infrastructure:
learning_steps.code:
cd linux-ctfs/aws  # or azure, or gcp
terraform init
terraform apply

learning_steps.description: SSH into the provisioned VM and work through each CTF challenge. Each challenge tests different Linux skills like file navigation, permissions, process management, and more.
When you're done, destroy the infrastructure to avoid charges:

checklist.text: I destroyed the lab resources with terraform destroy
